title: Angel's Cafe at Living Waters Health Food Store
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion
description: An all-raw/organic/vegan cafe inside a health food store. Serves smoothies, juices, grab 'n go raw vegan and vegan food, soup of the day, made-in-house almond milk and almond milk yogurt. Store carries a variety of vegan foods and fresh produce. Creates new recipes every week and always has at least 10 options in the grab 'n go and at least one soup each day in addition to the full service juice and smoothie bar. The food is grab 'n go but does have three outdoor picnic tables, two shaded and one full sun, and is just a few blocks from the beach and two parks. Staff is willing to create custom foods for those undergoing specific medical treatments or with any medical condition that makes finding food difficult.
